articles.title: Campaigns sorting
articles.desc: It is now possible to sort campaigns by their visibility status.

articles.title: Segments duplication
articles.desc: A new duplication option has been added on the segments listing page.

articles.title: A/B campaigns testing
articles.desc: (Enterprise) You can now send a test email for the version B of an A/B test campaign.

articles.title: Better custom fields detection
articles.desc: When importing users by file, columns containing custom fields are now detected better.

articles.title: Creation date display
articles.desc: The way the creation date is shown in the templates listing has been improved to avoid confusion with the name.

articles.title: Easier user search
articles.desc: We added the possibility to sort the subscribers by their user account ID.

articles.title: FLEXIcontent articles
articles.desc: The Read more link can now be inserted for FLEXIcontent articles.

articles.title: Joomla articles menu
articles.desc: When inserting Joomla articles in an email, you can now specify the menu to use for this article's link.

articles.title: Article tracking URLs
articles.desc: We fixed the tracking URLs in some cases for inserted articles.

articles.title: Joomla 3 menu items
articles.desc: The AcyMailing menu items can now be created on Joomla 3 websites.

articles.title: Better iCagenda integration
articles.desc: We fixed an issue for iCagenda with the daylight saving time in some cases, and improved the translations for custom views.

articles.title: Unsubscribe all link
articles.desc: We fixed the unsubscribe all link when the Joomla SEF option is active.

articles.title: Module creation
articles.desc: The module creation has been fixed, all fields were not correctly displayed

articles.title: Confirmation messages
articles.desc: The confirmation messages have been improved when an email is sent to a user or when they click the confirmation link.

articles.title: System messages
articles.desc: System messages could be shown on the front-end when overriding website emails. This has been disabled.

articles.title: List owner information
articles.desc: The insertion of list owner information in the emails now works correctly.

articles.title: WooCommerce prices
articles.desc: An issue has been fixed when displaying prices with discounts in WooCommerce dynamic content when sending campaigns.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Birthday campaigns
articles.desc: Birthday campaigns could still be sent to the receivers when the birthday field was deleted after activating the campaign.

articles.title: Automatic sending
articles.desc: The automatic sending process could send only a few emails on some servers, this has been fixed.

articles.title: Automated tasks report
articles.desc: The cron email report is no longer sent when no action was triggered.

articles.title: ElasticEmail integration
articles.desc: The verification of ElasticEmail API key now works correctly.

articles.title: Unsubscribe page
articles.desc: The website main content could be shown above the unsubscribe page in some cases, it has been fixed now.

articles.title: Bounce handling
articles.desc: We fixed an issue that could happen on bounce handling if the IMAP extension isn't active on the server.

articles.title: Multilingual lists
articles.desc: Saving a list when the multilingual is active no longer changes the list name to the currently viewed language.

articles.title: BCC addresses
articles.desc: You can now use addresses in BCC that aren't in the AcyMailing users yet.

articles.title: Add-ons compatibility
articles.desc: We fixed an error message happening for users with old versions of some add-ons like the ones for Community Builder and Event Booking.
